msg.vfp.ink_mirror.cannot.use: Your spawn point is not set or you cannot use Ink Mirrors yet
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.red_flint: Dropped occasionally from gravel. Use to make very sharp cutting tools
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.flint_butcher_axe: Use to cull livestock for better drop rates. Add some Looting for better rates with standard hostile mob drops as well.
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.bit_pipette: Use to squeeze a bit more out of your scarce ingredients. Not consumed by most recipes (there are exceptions)
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.potion_mixer_funne: Use to mix potions into stackable custom Tonics
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.fermented_feather: A substitute for fermented spider eye in brewing
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.lava_sand: A great way to store lava buckets for use as a smelting fuel
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.birch_bark: Obtain by crafting or stripping a Birch log with a Cutter
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.empty_bucket_jar: Use to transfer up to a bucket of liquid from or to a tank
tooltip_full.item.vfp.empty_bucket_jar: {SUMM}. Right-click the jar on tank or place the tank in slot 0 along with an empty jar in a crafting grid. When full, use a big jar as a substitute for a bucket of the contained liquid in any pantry-related recipe. You can stack jars filled with the same liquid.
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.fire_proofing_powd: A substitute for magma cream in brewing
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.iron_stomach: Keep on hotbar or in a charm slot as a buffer against food poisoning, nausea, and other tummy-twisters.
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.lesser_ink_pearl_m: Right-click to jump to last set respawn location. Mirror consumed if jump successful.
tooltip_full.item.vfp.lesser_ink_pearl_m: {SUMM} Limited to a single dimension. Requires completion of the Nomad's Sky advancement to use!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.ink_pearl_mirror: Right-click to jump to last set respawn location. Mirror consumed if jump successful.
tooltip_full.item.vfp.ink_pearl_mirror: {SUMM} Works across dimensions. Requires completion of the Nomad's Sky advancement to use!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.greater_ink_pearl_: Right-click to jump to last set respawn location. Works across dimensions. Unlimited uses.
tooltip_full.item.vfp.greater_ink_pearl_: {SUMM} Requires completion of the Nomad's Sky advancement to use!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.ultimate_ink_pearl: Right-click to jump to last set respawn location. Works across dimensions. Unlimited uses.
tooltip_full.item.vfp.ultimate_ink_pearl: {SUMM} Burn proof. Requires completion of the Nomad's Sky advancement to use!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.bamboo_shoots_raw: Dropped from bamboo saplings harvested with a cutter. Unsafe to eat; better to boil first
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.oak_acorn: Dropped occasionally from oak tree leaves. Unsafe to eat; better to remove tannins first
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.raftugli_fruit: Dropped occasionally from jungle tree leaves
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.spruce_tips: Harvest from Spruce leaves with an empty hand or any wooden stick
tooltip_full.item.vfp.nomads_meal_bar: {SUMM}. The ultimate on-the-go food. Eating a full bar keeps you plenty satisfied a full Minecraft day
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.bird_food: It's pure. It's fun. It's bird food
tooltip_full.item.vfp.bird_food: {SUMM}. Will heal a hurt polly or chickpea to full health. Can be used to tame parrots to pollies as well.
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.portion_heat: One item's smelt energy. Craft with a Cutter and ANY fuel source that smelts 1-64 items (only vanilla fuel sources shown in JEI).
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.portion_water: Obtain by crafting or right-clicking a Bit Measure against potable or clean fresh water
tooltip_full.item.vfp.roasted_corncoal: Corny coal...I dare you to automate crafting this
tooltip_full.item.vfp.acorncoal: Nutty coal...I double-dog-dare you to automate crafting this
tooltip_full.item.vfp.ravager_meatcoal: Meaty coal...I triple-dog-dare you to automate crafting this
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.trona_crystals: Dropped from the rare Trona ore
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.natron_crystals: Dropped from Natron ore. Use for Drying Agent and baking soda
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.muscle_mayonnaise: Put on any decker sandwich for a bit more muscle per bite!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.wrapped_egg: Might be unsafe to eat; better to cook first
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.fungi_purged: Obtain by crafting or shift+ right-clicking a raw mushroom in clean water
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.crystalized_honey: Same as honey but without bottles and is 64 stackable
tooltip_full.item.vfp.crystalized_honey: {SUMM}. Use a dispenser with Drying Agent to extract from beehive directly
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.foodpowder_muscle_: Gives your food a bit more 'muscle'.
tooltip_full.item.vfp.foodpowder_muscle_: {SUMM} A muscle boost can cure more than fatigue-- it can include a touch of ongoing damage resistance and absorption too!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.bottle_swamp_water: You probably shouldn't drink this ever
tooltip_full.item.vfp.bottle_swamp_water: {SUMM}. Obtain by crafting or filling a bottle with water in a swamp biome
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.cake_slice: Soak with a potion for a unique treat!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.golden_fruit_pie: Shines in more than one way
tooltip_full.item.vfp.golden_fruit_pie: {SUMM}. Eating an entire golden pie keeps you Well Fed for a full Minecraft day! Well worth its weight in gold.
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.bootleg_gelo-disab: Potion soaked Gelo you can insta-eat. Use any potion
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.snocone: Soak with a potion for a unique treat!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.rock_salt_crystals: Dropped from Rock Salt and Netherrack Salt ores
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.creamsoup: The benefits of milk in a delicious creamy soup
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.bat_poop: An innoculant, a fertilizer, and a substitute for Dragon's Breath in brewing
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.bat_raw: Might be unsafe to eat; better to cook first
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.bat_sonar_sac: Dropped very rarely by bats. Right-click to activate a temporary Bat-Sight effect around you.
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.wolf_spirit_elemen: Dropped rarely by wild wolves, very very rarely by tamed ones
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.washed_kelp_niblet: Obtain by crafting or shift+ right-clicking harvested kelp in clean fresh water
tooltip_summ.block.vfp.ink_kelp: Use directly in recipes or to start a farm
tooltip_full.block.vfp.ink_kelp: {SUMM}. Plant the crafted kelp in a river or shallow ocean for a renewable source of ink kelp powder and black dye
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.undead_wotsit: Strange medicine; right-click to consume. Heals one heart instantly but consumes one food level to do it
item.vfp.creamed_spam_eggs_toast: Creamed SPaM an' Egg on Toast
tooltip_full.item.vfp.all_eyes_trailmix: {SUMM}No need to wait 5-10-20 years, our special snack is available every day, all day! Cicadalicious! (No real cicadas should be harmed in the crafting of this recipe.)
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.bear_raw: Unsafe to eat; prepare and cook first!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.bear_raw_prepped: Might be unsafe to eat; better to cook first!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.bear_raw_charred: Unsafe to eat. Dropped by bears that die when on fire
tooltip_full.item.vfp.tainted_villager_s: {SUMM}. Use with Felis Life Essence to reanimate villagers (if your config permits).
tooltip_full.item.vfp.bane_of_ocelots: {SUMM}. Feed to a healthy ocelot to steal some of its life essence for Phoenix Feathers and villager reanimation (if config permits).
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.feline_life: Harvest from healthy ocelots with a Bane of Ocelots treat
tooltip_full.item.vfp.feline_life: {SUMM}. Use both a Slowness and a Healing potion on the target ocelot to maximize this item's drop rate.
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.guardian_air_sac: Unstack to use. Right-click to restore your air supply under water
tooltip_full.item.vfp.guardian_air_sac: {SUMM}. Also usable as a substitute for Dragon's Breath in brewing.
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.guardian_meat_raw: Unsafe to eat; cook first -- unless you're raiding an ocean temple and feel a bit fatigued.
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.ravager_meat_raw: Unsafe to eat; prepare and cook first!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.ravager_meat_prepp: Might be unsafe to eat; better to cook first!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.ravager_meat_charr: Unsafe to eat. Dropped by ravagers that die when on fire
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.ravager_bone: Dropped occasionally by ravagers when high looting used
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.ravager_left_horn: Dropped very rarely by ravagers when high looting used
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.ravager_right_horn: Dropped very rarely by ravagers when high looting used
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.phantom_meat_raw: Might be unsafe to eat; better to cook first!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.flesh_meal: Use like bone meal. Works on small flowers, vines, sugar cane, nether wart, and chorus fruit too!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.small_bone: Dropped occasionally from chickens, rabbits, and other small critters
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.seedmush: Cooks down slowly to produce Seed Oil for cooking
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.honey_sunbutter_sa: The SB&H. Honey, it's nature's jelly
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.crafty_preserves_s: The SB&J. Better than the original
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.jellyjam_sandwich: The JJ/T. For the purists...goes with Tea
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.cheese_jellyjam_sa: The JJ&C. Bestest weird sandwich EVER!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.kebab_adventure_ra: Might be unsafe to eat; better to cook first
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.kebab_poultry_raw: Might be unsafe to eat; better to cook first
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.nuggets_chicken_fr: Might be unsafe to eat; better to cook first
item.vfp.nuggets_cooked_pork_combo: Twice Fried Pork Bites and Starch Sticks
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.nuggets_pork_fried: Might be unsafe to eat; better to cook first
item.vfp.nuggets_pork_combo: Crispy Pork Bites and Fur Fries
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.decker_generic: A multi-use free form sandwich made of just about anything you want. Check the examples in JEI for ideas. Stackable for storage; §dunstack to eat.§7
tooltip_full.item.vfp.decker_generic: {SUMM} Only bread and one protein item is required to make a decker, but for all combos you MUST put the bread in 1st slot or the top left corner of the crafting grid!
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.decker_kinged: A towering multi-use sandwich of sandwiches. Go wild stacking up to 3 other sandwiches and squishing them with a Decker Press! Stackable for storage; §dunstack to eat.§7
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.decker_chicken: A simple decker made from roast chicken, fresh baked bread, and some veggies or salad greens. Stackable for storage; §dunstack to eat!§7
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.decker_steak: A simple decker made from grilled beef, oven baked bread, and a heap of caramelized alliums and mushrooms. Stackable for storage; §dunstack to eat!§7
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.decker_cheesesteak: A simple decker made from grilled beef, oven baked bread, and the ooey gooey deliciousness of cheese. Stackable for storage; §dunstack to eat!§7
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.decker_mutton: A simple decker made from perfectly roasted mutton, fresh baked bread, and just a touch of delicious sauteed alliums. Stackable for storage; §dunstack to eat!§7
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.decker_cuban: A crafty roast pork decker made in the style of the famous Cubano sandwich; pickles and mustard optional (sacrilege!). Stackable for storage; §dunstack to eat!§7
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.decker_fish: A simple 'decker of the sea' made from fish or seafood salad, the bread of your choice, and just a hint of tangy goodness. Stackable for storage; §dunstack to eat!§7
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.decker_veggie: A simple decker made from a bounty of tender, perfectly roasted vegetables and specially selected accompaniments. Stackable for storage; §dunstack to eat!§7
tooltip_summ.item.vfp.decker_lumberjack: A hefty sandwich made for hefty appetites. Make with SPaM, sing the song, be OK. Stackable for storage; §dunstack to eat!§7
tooltip_summ.vfp.decker_unstackit: Stackable if unused; unstack to eat!
tooltip_full.vfp.decker_unstackit: Multiple unused deckers §omade with the same ingredients§r§7 are stackable; however, you must unstack a single sandwich to eat it as you can eat from each sandwich many times! The value of each bite depends on what you put into the decker. And depending on your health, the food value can change to maximize your regeneration potential.
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.effect.v: Fume de Nausea and Tummy Aches
item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.vfp_: Splash Potion of The Sugar Bomb
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.vfp_s: Arrow of Go Faster Jump Higher
item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.vfp_: Splash Potion of The Sugar Bomb
item.minecraft.tipped_arrow.effect.vfp_l: Arrow of Go Faster Jump Higher
item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.vfp_: Splash Potion of The Ocean Deep
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.effect.v: Lingering Potion of The Ocean Deep
item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.vfp_: Splash Potion of The Ocean Deep
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.effect.v: Lingering Potion of The Ocean Deep
item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.vfp_: Splash Potion of The Water Native
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.effect.v: Lingering Potion of The Water Native
item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.vfp_: Splash Potion of Wolf's Spirit II
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.effect.v: Lingering Potion of Wolf's Spirit II
item.minecraft.splash_potion.effect.vfp_: Splash Potion of Bear's Spirit II
item.minecraft.lingering_potion.effect.v: Lingering Potion of Bear's Spirit II
achievement.vfp_debuggin.desc: This is a test advancement. Pretend you don't see me...
achievement.vfp_page.desc: Learn new ways to use Minecraft's basic foods
achievement.vfp_pantrybegun.desc: Make at least one additive or activator. Examples include Leavening Agent and What-What Powder.
achievement.vfp_allhandsondeck.desc: Start with one of the special house-designed Deckers, something easy like The Lumberjack or Cubano. Then, when you're ready for the big leagues, design your own awesome My-Way Decker and King-Me Decker sandwiches. Don't forget the mayo!
achievement.vfp_bakernovice.desc: Make and store some Starter Yeast, lots of Flour, and lots of Leavening Agent. Make some Dough. Make-and-Bake at least the shown amounts of these simple breads: Fried Doughs(4), Flat Bread(24), French Bread(24), and Enriched Bread(12). Be sure you taste-test all your handiwork too.
achievement.vfp_bakerprime.desc: Move beyond Novice Baker status. A prime baker must know how to Make-and-Bake every sandwich and specialty bread including the odd green one. To ensure you've mastered each recipe, bake at least a baker's dozen of each type. And as always, be sure to taste-test all your handiwork.
achievement.vfp_batsplat.desc: Collect all of the new bat drops at once (they must ALL be present in your player inventory at the same time)
achievement.vfp_beajerk: It's OK to Be a Jerk
achievement.vfp_beajerk.desc: To start make the lazyman Any Jerky. Now try the good stuff. Make a batch of Jerky Rub Mix. Apply generously to your favorite fish or steak (chicken should be jerked not jerkied). Let marinade overnight and low smoke for 4 hours (should take a few minutes in game time). Enjoy.
achievement.vfp_bravestomach.desc: Eat the raw or prepped version of every kind of VFP animal meat or egg as well as every kind of standard raw meat including those that hurt like raw chicken, puffer fish, and rotten flesh. Your stomach will not thank you.
achievement.vfp_chowderhound.desc: Slurp up some of every VFP chowder type. Dreamy creamy bowled goodness to warm your soul.
achievement.vfp_cocoaholic.desc: Consume every type of VFP and standard cocoa-based food AND drink. What sacrifices we must make for science-- cocoaliciously good!
achievement.vfp_coldandfrosty.desc: Find yourself some snowballs. Pack your snowballs into snow blocks then compact those into ice blocks. Now smash the ice blocks into Small Ice Cubes-- perfect for chilling any beverage on a hot day. Use any extra snowballs to have yourself a Snocone (or two). Truly invigorating!
achievement.vfp_cookiemonster.desc: COOKIES! MUST EAT THE COOKIES! ALL THE COOKIES! (a standard chocolate chip cookie and at least one of every type in our fine cookie collection. your reward if you complete this task is...a cookie)
achievement.vfp_edibleegg.desc: A dozen+1 uses for the hundreds of eggs you collected from that Day-1 chicken farm: Mayonnaise, Fried Eggs, Steamed Eggs, Egg+ Sandwich (any kind), Egg Bread, Broth topped with a Crispy Fried Egg, Egg-stuffed baked potato, and of course Egg Pies (any kind).
achievement.vfp_fingerfoodie.desc: Create all nuggets and furnace fries combo meals including the unencomboed N'orker nugget mix-- shouldn't take you more than a New York minute!
achievement.vfp_fizzyfeeling.desc: Make and drink a fizzy drink like the Mad Spritz Fizz or the Berry Blast Fizz. Hmmm... Flavored carbonated sugar water at its finest.
achievement.vfp_frankenbrewed.desc: First, practice by preparing a simple single-effect Tonic. Then, on a night when the moon is full, concoct a unique potion monsterpiece of multiple ingredients (at least 3 effects) that nature (Mojang) never intended to be combined, EVER. Bwaahahahahaaa!
achievement.vfp_gelodrive.desc: Pretend they're cattle and you're a cowboy: rustle together the ingredients and craft a Gelo of every basic flavor; eat at least one of them. Bootleg Gelos and gelo flavors based on other modded items like mangoes are not required.
achievement.vfp_getthemeats.desc: Make the most of your livestock. Craft and use a Butchering Axe to cull your animals and increase your chances for all their drops.
achievement.vfp_goldenfoodawards.desc: Gold + Food = Better Food! Let us celebrate this unique cuisine. To get your invite you need to make and intake these items: a Glistering Melon, a Golden Carrot, a Golden Apple, Golden Berries, Golden Sugar, Golden Beetroots, a golden Polar Crystal or a golden Wolf Essense, and lastly a Golden Pie. See you there!
achievement.vfp_goldilocks.desc: Not too hot. Not too cold. Not too sour. Not too sweet. Not too hard. Not too soft. Juuuust right! To complete this challenge, you must finish ALL of the sub-tasks to the right!
achievement.vfp_goodbarfood.desc: Make a Nomad's Meal Bar. Big taste, big nutrition, little packages.
achievement.vfp_grandmasdelight.desc: Make Grandma's favorite dinner pies: a Ham egg pie and a Salmon fish pie. Grandmas, they really are the best!
achievement.vfp_grillmeister.desc: Some things are definitely skewed just right... Prepare and grill a 'stack' (4) of each type of kebab. Become a Backyard Barbeque Boss, yea!
achievement.vfp_hoardingwego.desc: Make and fill any carton for bulk storage
achievement.vfp_hotandsteamy.desc: Get a Bit o' Heat going and boil a bucket of water (it's safe to drink always). Then reheat at least one food item like a creamy soup or some stew for a heart-warming, full body saturation boost!
achievement.vfp_iunshrunkthebees.desc: Minecraft bees...beautiful, buzzy, bumblely, and BIG. Let's steal their honey and see what happens. Get some Crystalized Honey. Make a Honeycomb Bowl, add milk, drink up (handy when those bees find you). Add some honey to your baked goodies (breads, muffins). Discover how honey + melon = little bites of Yum!
achievement.vfp_jellysunjam.desc: A jelly, a jam, and a chorus of preserves came upon a field of beautiful sunflowers one day. Culinary mayhem ensued: kernels were roasted, fruits were mushed, butter was whipped, food acronyms were born! Recreate this glorious day then prepare and enjoy an SB&J and one other: a JJ/T, a JJ&C, or a SB&H.
achievement.vfp_juicerific.desc: Amazing all the solid food things you can squeeeeze into tasty nutritious liquid things. Use the squishing magic of craft tablehood to make these juices: apple cider (the minecraft dad drink), berries, cacti (a little thorny to get), sugarcane (sssweet!), kelp (salty!), watermelon (refreshing!), po-tay-to (for fallout), ugli ugli (for lemonade fans), and mixed veggies (for moms everywhere)
achievement.vfp_kelphelp.desc: Get a traveling merchant to help with a shake made of kelp
achievement.vfp_lazyforaging.desc: While out and about your world collect or make the following items for your pantry: Rock Salt crystals, Natron crystals, fresh Spruce Tips, dropped Oak Acorns, Apples, cleaned Mushrooms, ripe Pumpkins, washed Kelp Nibbles, and a Bunch o' Berries.
achievement.vfp_lifelikemysterysalad: Life is Like a Bowl of Mystery
achievement.vfp_lifelikemysterysalad.des: You never know what you're gonna get...Try a Suspicious Stew and Mysterious Fruit Salad combo. Good luck.
achievement.vfp_makingdough.desc: Make at least a half dozen Dough Balls with Leavening Agent. It's good to keep a reserve of dough around.
achievement.vfp_mooriches.desc: Obtain some bottled milk and bottled cream
achievement.vfp_nevermuffed.desc: Prepare a batch of delicious Carrot Muffins; try one or two yourself. Then make another batch of a different flavor; try one or two yourself... You get the idea.
achievement.vfp_newtastes.desc: Relax and make some homemade butter and cheese. Concentrate to get some condensed milk.
achievement.vfp_nottoohard.desc: Steamed and Fried Eggs. Easy to make right, easier to make wrong. They should be soft but not too soft lest they take off running. They should be hard but not too hard as you still need them to crack under pressure
achievement.vfp_nottoosweet.desc: Often times, just a little sweetness can make a meal perfect. Make these foods for such occasions: Apple Muffins, Fried Sweet Dough, Fruit Salad, and Honey Roasted Nuts
achievement.vfp_nowyourecooking.desc: Every pantry that's any pantry needs a supply of meat stock and vegetable stock. Make at least two batches of each type.
achievement.vfp_oddtastes.desc: Pigs can get a bit salty but you need that to get smoked hocks and pigtail. Dogs are your best friends, wolves not so much especially if you try to steak them. Good luck procuring that polar bear and ravager meat.
achievement.vfp_nomads_sky.desc: A boundary-less world demands a bit of exploration don't ya think? Go out and spend some time under the stars (and don't forget the picnic basket). To reach this goal, you must finish ALL of the sub-tasks to the right! Unlocks Inked Mirrors.
achievement.vfp_pearljammin.desc: Create an Ink Pearl from Ink Pearl Fragments you have collected
achievement.vfp_pickledpink.desc: Make some pickling spice mix or beet red pickled eggs
achievement.vfp_portionintime.desc: Craft a Bit Measure and two bits or small portions o' something (at least one food). Examples include a Bit o' Sugar and a Pumpkin Slice
achievement.vfp_powahaid.desc: Make Muscle Bread and one other 'muscled' food like a Muscle Egg or Over-stuffed Muscle Potato.
achievement.vfp_singlecookgoodstew.desc: Too many cooks can spoil the stew but just a single hungry player, well that''s OK! Make yourself at least two different hearty stews; the weirder, the better (rabbit stew does NOT count)
achievement.vfp_sourplus.desc: This won't be pretty, but you need to make up all the uglies. Be careful, they are a sour bunch: Ugli Fruit Drink, Ugli-Ugli Gelo, Ugli Muffins, and Ugli Smash Jam (this one is tricky- sweet, sour, and ugli, all in one)
achievement.vfp_spirtshavingflown.desc: Brew a Wolf or Bear Spirit potion or, for the adventurous, a Potion of Undying.
achievement.vfp_stickysit.desc: Using some Sticky Paste, craft at least 8 Empty Paper Bags for bulk storage.
achievement.vfp_sweetytooth.desc: Make some Raw Sugar; eat some. Good right? Make a batch of Taffy; eat some. Good right? Make a batch of Fudge; eat some. Good right? Bee mean and steal some honey and comb; eat all of it. Good right? Make a Sugar Bomb gelo; eat it. Good right? Make some Syrup Sno; eat it. Good right? Make a cake; eat a slice. Good right?
achievement.vfp_teatime.desc: Take a break and have some tea. Cream and sugar optional.
achievement.vfp_thewalkingspam.desc: Create a Steamed 'SPaM' dish from rotten flesh
achievement.vfp_undeadscience.desc: Make a batch of Undead Wotsits. Pick a fight with a hostile mob bigger than you. Start losing the fight. Insta-eat 1 or 2 undead wotsits whenever your natural regen stops working and you're tempted to run away. Eat some regular dead food to replenish your food points. Victory shall be yours!
achievement.vfp_wegotthebeets.desc: Let's beet right to the point, you'll need to eat: raw beetroots straight from the garden and some yummy beetroot based soup with a beet of great beet red bread. What could possibly beet that? A bunch of Golden Beetroots for dessert, that's what!
achievement.vfp_wellbalanced.desc: Include all the new VFP veggies (cooked or raw), vegetarian dishes, seed and fruit snacks in your diet. Yup, that means actually eating or drinking your fruits and vegetables tonight (and before you ask, desserts and SB&J do not count).
achievement.vfp_wellstuffed.desc: Create and eat an Over-stuffed Potato or bake a set of pasties.
achievement.vfp_wellthatsnotright.desc: Figure out how to make some Powdered Water. Be careful. Never mix this stuff with water, bad things can happen we think.
achievement.vfp_worsecrossover.desc: Go where no Minecrafter has gone before and make every kind of 'Klingon' item in the mod. True, you don't have to trek more than nine spaces to see this task is next generation unoriginal. And as enterprising a culinary voyage the mod tries to be, we shouldn't just kling onto straws (I mean they aren't even green!)
achievement.vfp_zombiecuisine.desc: Procure a jar of Jungle JuJu Juice
barter.vfp_egg_pie.desc: 1 Base Token for 4 Plain Egg Pies
jei.vfp_animaldrops: One of the new animal drops added by Vanilla Food Pantry. Your chance to get special drops (like potion ingredients) is often improved if you use a butchering axe or a tool with the looting enchantment.
jei.vfp_oredrops: One of the new ores or ore block drops added by Vanilla Food Pantry. Found in terrain and loot chests generated after the mod was installed.
jei.vfp_miscdrops: One of the new tree drops added by Vanilla Food Pantry. Acorns can drop from regular oak and dark oak tree leaves. Raftugli fruit drop from jungle tree leaves. Spruce tips drop from spruce tree leaves.
jei.vfp_reward_item: One of the special reward items given to players who complete a food pantry challenge. These reward items are not craftable.
jei.vfp_defined_deckers: One of the pre-defined decker sandwiches in Vanilla Food Pantry. The example recipe shows the required layout and accepted ingredients. The sample output is hard-wired for French Bread.
jei.vfp_kingme_decker: A towering sandwich of sandwiches. Create a King-Me decker by stacking up to three(3) other sandwiches and squishing them with a Decker Press! The sample output shows one particular combination.
jei.vfp_generic_decker: A free form sandwich made of just about anything you want. Check the sample layouts in JEI or read the github wiki page on VFP sandwiches for the expected layout and usable ingredients by category.
jei.vfp_superblocks_items: Luminesce and Birch Sap are items added by the SuperBlocks mod. If that mod is present, you will be able to bulk store these items in jars.
jei.vfp_hostiledrops: One of the new hostile mob drops added by Vanilla Food Pantry. Guardian Fins can be used to craft shulker boxes. Villager Souls combined with Felis Life can help you spawn new villagers.
